Tools.Project2: A dynamic website that highlights my ability to bring ideas to life through clean code and engaging user experiences. My role focused on frontend development, animations, SEO optimization, and ensuring the site feels both interactive and enjoyable to explore. The design was a collaborative effort with a friend, and together we built a project that is both visually striking and impactful. Tools.Project3: An innovative web platform designed to connect fitness enthusiasts with qualified personal trainers. My main contribution was in frontend development, where I implemented a responsive design and an intuitive user interface to enhance the user experience. The site features key functionalities such as detailed trainer profiles, advanced search options, and an easy-to-use booking system. Working closely with a team of designers and backend developers, I helped create a platform that is not only functional but also visually appealing, using an energizing color palette and clear typography to reflect the vitality of the fitness world.
Tools.Project4:
A modern travel website designed to elevate the flight selection experience through immersive 3D visualization. Users can explore different aircraft models in interactive 3D, allowing them to view planes from every angle and better understand what they are choosing before flying.

The platform also provides detailed seat class previews, enabling users to compare economy, business, and first-class seating layouts visually and intuitively. This helps travelers make informed decisions based on comfort, space, and overall experience.

In addition, the website includes a dedicated flight plans section where users can browse available routes, travel options, and flight packages in a clear and organized way. The project focuses on user experience, visual clarity, and modern web interaction to transform traditional flight booking into a more engaging and transparent process.
